text: 委員会も自分が生き残ることを最優先に考えている。そのための彼は惜しむまい。 / 人はもう現れないというのが彼らの論拠でしたからね。 / ああ、もう一つ朗報です。
translation: The committee also considers their own survival as the top priority. They won't hesitate to spend money for that purpose. / Their argument was that the Angels wouldn't appear anymore. / Ah, there's one more piece of good news.

vocabulary.meaning: to be reluctant to, to hesitate to spend

grammar: そのための彼は惜しむまい - まい indicates negative presumption/will not

text: 米国を除くすべての理事国がエヴァ6号機の予算を承認しました。
translation: All council nations except the United States have approved the budget for Eva Unit 06.
grammar: を除く - except for, excluding

text: まあ、米国も時間の問題でしょう。 / 失業者アレルギーですしね、あの国。 / 君の国は? / 8号機から建造に参加します。
translation: Well, it's just a matter of time for the US too. / That country is allergic to unemployment, after all. / What about your country? / We'll participate in construction starting with Unit 08.
grammar: ですしね - casual confirmation with し adding a reason

text: 第二次整備計画はまだ生きてますから。 / ただパイロットが見つかっていないという問題はありますが。 / 使徒は再び現れた。
translation: The Second Supplementary Plan is still alive. / Though there is the problem that we haven't found pilots yet. / The Angels have appeared again.

vocabulary.meaning: to be alive, to be in effect

grammar: 見つかっていない - negative continuation of state using ている

text: 我々の道は彼らを倒すしかあるまい。 / 私もセカンドインパクトの二の舞はごめんですからね。
translation: Our path is nothing but to defeat them. / I don't want a repeat of Second Impact either.
grammar: しかあるまい - nothing but, must (formal negative presumption)

text: じゃあ、南極大陸が蒸 / 発したセカンドインパクトって。
translation: So then, Second Impact when the Antarctic continent evaporated...
grammar: って - casual quotative/topic marker at end of sentence for questioning

text: そう、歴史の教科書では大質量隕石の落下による大惨事となっているけど、事実は往々にして隠蔽されるものなのよ。
translation: Right. In history textbooks it's presented as a catastrophe from a massive meteorite impact, but the truth is often concealed.
grammar: ものなのよ - explanatory のだ form with feminine ending よ

text: 15年前、人類は最初の人と呼称する人型の物体を南極で発見したの。
translation: 15 years ago, humanity discovered a humanoid object in Antarctica that we call the First Angel.
grammar: と呼称する - to call/designate as

text: でもその調査中に原因不明の大爆発を起こしたの。
translation: But during the investigation, it caused a massive explosion of unknown origin.
grammar: を起こす - to cause, to trigger (an incident)

text: それがセカンドインパクトの正体。 / じゃあ、 / 僕らのやってることは。
translation: That's the true nature of Second Impact. / So then... / what we're doing is...
grammar: やっていること - nominalized form of やっている (what we're doing)

text: 予想されうるサードインパクトを未然に防ぐ / そのためのネルフとエヴァンゲリオンなのよ
translation: Preventing the predicted Third Impact before it happens - that's what NERV and Evangelion are for.
grammar: されうる - potential form of される (can be predicted); そのための - for that purpose

text: ところであれ予定通り明日やるそうよ
translation: By the way, I heard they're doing that thing tomorrow as scheduled.
grammar: やるそうよ - hearsay そうだ with feminine よ

text: わかったわ
translation: Understood.
grammar: わ - feminine sentence ending particle

text: おはよう / おはようございます / 仕事で旧東京まで行ってくるわ
translation: Good morning. / Good morning. / I'm going to Old Tokyo for work.
grammar: 行ってくるわ - going and coming back (ていく + くる) with feminine わ

text: 多分帰りは遅いからなんか出張って / じゃ
translation: I'll probably be back late, so get something for dinner. / Well then.
grammar: なんか出張って - casual contraction, likely meaning to get food; って at end implies continuation

text: あ、はい
translation: Oh, okay.
grammar: Simple acknowledgment

text: ここがかつて花の都と呼ばれていた大都会とはね / 着いたわよ
translation: To think this was once a great metropolis called the City of Flowers. / We've arrived.
grammar: とはね - expresses surprise/emotion about the topic; わよ - feminine emphatic

text: 何もこんなところでやらなくてもいいのに / でその計画戦時は絡んでるの / 戦略自衛隊
translation: They didn't have to do it in a place like this. / So is the military involved in this plan? / The Strategic Self-Defense Force.

vocabulary.meaning: to be involved, to be entangled

vocabulary.reading: せんりゃくじえいたい

grammar: なくてもいいのに - didn't have to/need to (with regret/criticism)

text: いえ介入は認められずよ / 通りで好きにやってるわけね
translation: No, their intervention isn't permitted. / No wonder they're doing whatever they want.
grammar: わけね - explanatory わけだ with confirmation ね

text: 本日はご多忙のところ / 我が日本重化学工業協同隊の実演会にお越しいただき / 誠にありがとうございます
translation: Thank you very much for taking time from your busy schedules to attend our Japan Heavy Chemical Industries Consortium demonstration today.

vocabulary.reading: じゅうかがくこうぎょう

grammar: お越しいただき - humble receiving form (thank you for coming)

text: 皆様には後ほど完成室の方にて / 更新運転をご覧いただきますが
translation: Later, everyone will be able to view the activation operation in the completion room.
grammar: ご覧いただく - humble receiving form (we will show you); が at end indicates continuation

text: ご質問のある方はこの場にてどうぞ / はい / これはご高名な赤城律子博士 / お越しいただき光栄の至りです
translation: Those with questions, please ask now. / Yes. / This is the renowned Dr. Ritsuko Akagi. / It's a great honor to have you here.
grammar: の至り - utmost/extreme degree (formal expression)

text: 質問をよろしいでしょうか / ご遠慮なくどうぞ / 先ほどのご説明ですと / 内燃機関を内蔵とありますが
translation: May I ask a question? / Please, don't hesitate. / According to your earlier explanation, / it has an internal combustion engine built-in...
grammar: ですと - according to, if; とありますが - it says/states but...

text: 本機の大きな特徴です / 連続150日間の作戦行動が保障されております
translation: That's a major feature of this unit. / It guarantees continuous operational activity for 150 days.
grammar: されております - polite passive form with おる (formal business language)

text: しかし格闘船を前提とした陸戦兵器にリアクターを内蔵することは
translation: However, installing a reactor in a land combat weapon designed for close combat...
grammar: を前提とした - based on the premise of; することは - doing... (topic)

text: 安全性の点から見てもリスクが大きすぎると思われますが / 5分も動かない決戦兵器よりは役に立つと思いますよ
translation: From a safety perspective, the risk seems too great. / I think it's more useful than a decisive weapon that can't even move for 5 minutes.
grammar: から見ても - even from the perspective of; も動かない - can't even move

text: 遠隔操縦では緊急対処に問題を残します / パイロットに負担をかけ精神汚染を起こすよりはより人道的と考えます
translation: Remote control has problems with emergency response. / We consider it more humane than burdening pilots and causing mental contamination.
grammar: よりは - rather than, compared to; と考えます - we think that

text: よしなさいよ大人げない / 人的制御の問題もあります / 制御不能に陥り暴走を許す危険極まりない兵器よりは安全だと思いますがね
translation: Stop it, that's childish. / There's also the problem of human control. / I think it's safer than an extremely dangerous weapon that can fall into loss of control and allow a rampage.
grammar: よしなさいよ - imperative to stop with feminine よ; 危険極まりない - extremely dangerous

text: 制御できない兵器など全くのナンセンスです / ヒステリーを起こした女性と同じですよ / 手に負えません
translation: A weapon that can't be controlled is complete nonsense. / It's the same as a woman having a fit of hysteria. / It's unmanageable.
grammar: など - such things as (dismissive); 全くの - complete, utter; と同じ - the same as
